programme.desc: A genie grants Odie's wish to fly; Garfield attempts to steal Jon's dinner; Orson tries to make Roy pay for what the rooster owes; a witch sets her sights on Jon.

programme.sub-title: The Cartoon Cat Conspiracy; The Picnic Panic
programme.desc: Garfield creates his own cartoon where he gets his own way; Garfield tries to prevent ants from ruining Jon's picnic.

programme.sub-title: Sound Judgment; The Perils of Penelope

programme.sub-title: Ghost of a Chance; Roy Gets Sacked; Revenge of the Living Lunch
